newsitem.title: USA: MIAMI, June 27 (Reuter) - A lawyer pressing a.
newsitem.headline: MIAMI, June 27 (Reuter) - A lawyer pressing a.

text.p: A lawyer pressing a landmark class-action suit against cigarette makers on Friday said tobacco company attorneys were ahead in the competition to seat favorable jurors after four weeks of initial screening.
"We have not been nearly as successful," Stanley Rosenblatt, a lawyer for the plaintiffs, said in court.
